Bus-Transportation-Management-System-main.routes.route_routes module

Author: Samiul Ahamed Fhyas

routes.route_routes.search_routes()[source]

Search for bus routes based on query parameters.

Query Parameters:

from/src (str): Source location (required) to/dst (str): Destination location (required) date/travel_date (str): Travel date (required) bus_type/type (str, optional): Filter by bus type operator (str, optional): Filter by operator price_min (float, optional): Minimum fare price_max (float, optional): Maximum fare sort_by (str, optional): Sort criteria

Returns:

JSON response with buses list and suggestions.

routes.route_routes.seat_layout(route_id: int)[source]

Get seat layout for a specific bus route.

Parameters:

route_id (int) – The ID of the bus route.

Query Parameters:

date (str): Travel date (required)

Returns:

JSON response with route details and seat layout.

routes.route_routes.routes_meta()[source]

Get metadata about distinct stations and operators.

Returns:

JSON response with lists of stations and operators.

routes.route_routes.routes_all()[source]

Get all bus routes with enriched data.

Returns:

JSON response with list of all bus routes.
